title.native: The Kid Who Would Be King

production.country: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland (the)

director.name: Joe Cornish
director.nationality: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland (the)

person.name: Patrick Stewart
person.nationality: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland (the)

synopsis.native: Alex, a 12-year-old boy, and his friends fight an evil sorceress with the help of Excalibur, the sword of King Arthur, in a bid to save the world from her atrocities.
